title: fried rice
description: Get a taste of the takeaway at a fraction of the cost with this recipe for tasty egg-fried rice with veggies. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz cooked rice (preferably one-day old) or 200g/7oz rice
½ - 1 tsp chilli flakes, to taste
1 bunch coriander, leaves and stalks separated, leaves roughly chopped, stalks finely chopped
1 lime, juice of half, half cut into wedges
